original_text: When Delilah saw that he had told her all his heart, she sent and called the lords of the Philistines, saying, “Come up again, for he has told me all his heart.” Then the lords of the Philistines came up to her and brought the money in their hands.
korean_text: 들릴라가 삼손이 진심을 다 알려 주므로 사람을 보내어 블레셋 사람들의 방백들을 불러 이르되 삼손이 내게 진심을 알려 주었으니 이제 한 번만 올라오라 하니 블레셋 방백들이 손에 은을 가지고 그 여인에게로 올라오니라

sentences.original_text: When Delilah saw that he had told her all his heart
sentences.korean_translation: 들릴라가 그가 자신의 마음을 다 털어놓은 것을 보고는

sentences.original_text: she sent and called the lords of the Philistines
sentences.korean_translation: 그녀는 사람을 보내 블레셋 방백들을 불렀습니다

sentences.original_text: for he has told me all his heart.”
Then the lords of the Philistines came up to her
and brought the money in their hands.
